member_organisations: None. We are small family owned company, shareholders and authorized signatories are from one family - son and father.

goals__remit: Distribution of premium tobacco products in Slovakia and Europe with focus on cigars, cigarillos and pipe tobacco. Company acts as European logistic hub for several cigar manufacturers, operating bonded warehouse and shipping cigars to various countries.
